RFP.raw_text:
Tender No xx Year 2020

Technical Development 
of 
Corporate Performance Management System

IMPLEMENTATION AND SUPPORT SERVICES

2020

CONTENTS

INTRODUCTION

The Corporate Development department (PSD) of Ras Al Khaimah is responsible to carry out the necessary work in order to determine medium and long term strategy and policies of the administration in the framework of emirate level development strategy and policies, annual program and government programs.  Also, responsible to o develop performance and quality indicators across all the departments and agencies within PSD.

Coordinating the preparation of the strategic plan and performance program of the administration and    consolidating the results. Provides the stakeholders and the department heads with the necessary information on agreed master versus the actuals with overall risks / challenges. Also prepares the KPI rating for each agency and department level with scorecard mechanism and automatic integration with backend systems.

In line with RAK PSD objectives on improved corporate performance and governance, PSD is now seeking to implement an international best fit Corporate performance and enterprise risk management solution to support the programs of PSD in the most effective and efficient manner.

The PSD is seeking Proposals (Request for Proposal) from qualified and reputed Professional Consultants for the supply, operation and maintenance services of Oracle's PM tools to accomplish the following:

Utilize a single, easy-to-use and web-based system to access and manage strategy automation, Governance Risk & Compliance, Project Portfolio Management, and Enterprise Risk Management

Automate and apply common simplified, streamlined core business processes 
Provide real-time visibility across PSD, department / agency level

Provide the core elements for strategy management

DEFINITIONS

The following definitions of terms are used in this Request for Proposal document.

INSTRUCTIONS TO BIDDERS

Technical and commercial proposals are solicited from an open bid. The administrative and technical requirements as detailed throughout this RFP will apply. Specific proposal format and content requirements are detailed in this section of the RFP.

The RFP outlines the minimum information and services being sought. Bidders are required to propose their own methodology and activities to execute what is described in this document.

Bidder competency and proven experience in undertaking similar projects shall be the leading factor in the evaluation, and the best offer price should be submitted.

The PSD requests that the bidders' proposals comply with the requirements set out below.

EXAMINATION OF DOCUMENTS

The bidders should carefully examine this RFP. Upon submitting their proposals, it will be assumed that bidders have become familiarized with the nature of the scope of services.

The bidders shall address all items as specified in this RFP. Failure to adhere to this format may lead to being disqualified as a bidder from further consideration as a participant. Such a decision by the PSD shall be final. Submission of a proposal shall further constitute evidence that the bidder is clear with respect to conditions which would affect the proper execution, and completion of the scope of works.

IT infrastructure, security... provided by PSD IT.
deliverables: Training of the PSD Transformation Team...
100% of the PSD users should receive basic training.
30% of the PSD users should receive advanced training.
25% of the Supervising Consultant and Contractor users should receive training.
